CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: When the PSC devices were fabricated with an inverted architecture ( ITO / ZnO / polymer : PC71BM / MoO 3 / Ag ) in order to further improve the photovoltaic performance , the PCEs of PTATDPP and PTAFDPP - based devices were improved to 7.02% and 5.22% , respectively ( Fig.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| ZnO |
| polymer (PC71BM) |
| MoO3 |
| Ag |
| PTATDPP |
| PTAFDPP |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| ZnO |
| polymer (PC71BM) |
| MoO3 |
| Ag |
| PTATDPP |
| PTAFDPP |

Explanation:
ITO, ZnO, polymer (PC71BM), MoO3, Ag, PTATDPP, and PTAFDPP are all material names mentioned in the paragraph. They are used to describe the different layers in the fabrication of the PSC devices.

Paragraph: When the PSC devices were fabricated with an inverted architecture ( ITO / ZnO / polymer : PC71BM / MoO 3 / Ag ) in order to further improve the photovoltaic performance , the PCEs of PTATDPP and PTAFDPP - based devices were improved to 7.02% and 5.22% , respectively ( Fig.

Note: "PCEs" stands for Power Conversion Efficiencies. These are material properties that describe the ability of a material to convert energy into electrical power. The other entities in the list are materials used in the fabrication of the photovoltaic devices.
